imdb.plot outline: Episode 3: HYSTERical focuses on several important issues surrounding the treatment of a condition called, Pelvic Congestion Syndrome. Three young Chicago women who have never even met have a common story and one that more than 7.5 million women in the US unknowingly share. Each woman has a unique story about how this condition is destroying her quality of life and challenging her trust in the health-care system - until they meet a very dedicated doctor who has the skills to treat what no one else could. It seems they have finally found an answer until another obstacle arises.
imdb.title: Without a Scalpel
plot: HYSTERical focuses on several critical women's health issues. Find out why many women suffer for years and go undiagnosed and untreated.::Susan R Jackson
